name: Mephit Stone
I0D: This rainbow stone is about 6 inches long, and half an inch thick. It resembles more of a pencil than a gemstone.
I1D: If the stone is snapped in half, you can use an action to speak its command word and summon any Mephit from the monster manual, as if you had cast a summon spell. The stone can't be used this way again until the next dawn, when it will magically repair itself.
